contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Anthisnes |picture= |picture=Anthisnes JPG01.jpg |picture-legend= |map=Anthisnes Liège Belgium Map.png |map-legend=Location of Anthisnes in the province of Liège |arms=Héraldique Ville BE Anthisnes.svg |flag=Anthisnes_Belgium.svg |region={{BE-REG-WAL}} |community={{BE-FR}} |province={{BE-PROV-LG}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Huy|Huy]] |nis=61079 |pyramid-date |0-19= |20-64 |65 |foreigners= |foreigners-date |mayor=[[Marc Tarabella]] ([[Parti Socialiste (Belgium)|PS]]) |majority=[[Socialist Party (francophone Belgium)|PS]]-IC |postal-codes=4160-4163 |telephone-area=04 |web=[http://www.anthisnes.be/ www.anthisnes.be] |lat_deg=50 |lat_min=29 |lon_deg=05 |lon_min=31 }} '''Anthisnes''' is a [[Belgium|Belgian]] [[municipality]] located in the [[Wallonia|Walloon]] province of [[Liège (province)|Liège]]. On January 1, 2006 Anthisnes had a total population of 3,998. The total area is 37.08 km² which gives a [[population density]] of 108 inhabitants per km². ==Famous inhabitants== * [[Marc Tarabella]], mayor, [[member of the European Parliament]] ==References== {{reflist}} {{Liege municipalities}} [[Category:Populated places in Belgium]] [[Category:Municipalities of Liège (province)]] {{Liege-geo-stub}}
